data.Title: Avatar
data.Plot: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

data.Title: I Am Legend
data.Plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.
King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

data.Title: The Avengers
data.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

data.Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
data.Plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

data.Title: Interstellar
data.Plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
